    • Field Detail

      • HEARTBEAT_SENTINEL

        public static final java.lang.String HEARTBEAT_SENTINEL
        The sentinel placed in cache keys to signal this is a heartbeat entry.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MIN_HEARTBEAT_DURATION

        public static final java.time.Duration MIN_HEARTBEAT_DURATION
        The minimum amount of time between heartbeats.

      • DEFAULT_HEARTBEAT_DURATION

        public static final java.time.Duration DEFAULT_HEARTBEAT_DURATION
        The default heart rate.

      • TIME_TO_LIVE_RATIO

        public static final long TIME_TO_LIVE_RATIO
        The multiplication factor to boost cache time to live duration by relative to heart rate. Essentially this controls how many "missed" heartbeats are allowed before an instance is considered to have terminated.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Returns:
        key for a particular instance
